title: Brazil still the most expensive country to buy an iPhone SE 3, iPad Air 5, Mac Studio, or Studio Display
content:
Yesterday, Apple unveiled in its “Peek Performance” event a new iPhone SE 3, iPad Air 5, Mac Studio, and Studio Display. If you’re looking for the best countries to buy one of these products – or regions to avoid – Brazil is still the worst place you could think about buying a new Apple product.

more…

The post Brazil still the most expensive country to buy an iPhone SE 3, iPad Air 5, Mac Studio, or Studio Display appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Brazil is still the worst place you could think about buying a new iPhone SE 3, iPad Air 5, Mac Studio, or Studio Display.
